Profanity! Profanity! Profanity!
Share Profanity! with... TEXT CONTENT FOR MAIN <--> Dictionary Dictionary Preferences About Exit Mofo Studio Logo
TEXT CONTENT FOR NOTIFIACTIONS <--> Profanity! Rnning as a background service.
TEXT CONTENT FOR PREFERENCES <-->
Status Enabled Disabled switch_on_off show_text Show text Show Profanity! text start_as_service Start on Boot Up Start as a service on device boot pack Language Pack Select the language pack to use sensitivity Sensitivity Change sensitivity to motion threshold Threshold Change the minimum trigger threshold refractory_period Refractory Period Change the interval time between events volume_text Volume Set Volume
TEXT CONTENT FOR ABOUT <--> About Profanity... This application will curse in your language of your choice whenever your phone is shaken. The harder you shake your phone the more offensive the profanity. 

The profanities used in the original “Bongo English” list stem from research into the use of profanities in English undertaken jointly by the Advertising Standards Authority,and British Broadcasting Corporation, “Delete Expletives?” [2000].

 The use and history of expletives, profanities and curses is likely to be as ancient as the origins of language itself. This application aims to simultaneously entertain, amuse and educate. Indeed the icon used to launch the app is a "grawlix" (Lexicon of Comicana - Mort Walker [1980])- of the type seen in comics used as a substitute for profanities 

The etymology of each expletive is explained, although in some instances this may be conjectural.

The author of this application has made the conscious decision to remove racial and most religious profanity.

I hope that this application offends everyone that uses it. However, that statement is meant with the best of intentions! Now f**k off and enjoy the app! TEXT CONTENT FOR CustomAlert<--> Are you sure you want to exit? OK Yes No
DATABASE string constants<--> Profanity.db String Delimiters <--> : , >>
